derivation: from H3068 (יְהֹוָה) and H5251 (נֵס) with the prononimal suffix; Jehovah (is) my banner;
outline:
Jehovah-nissi = "Jehovah is my banner"
  1. the name given by Moses to the altar which he built in commemoration of the discomfiture of the Amalekites
strongs_def: Jehovah-Nissi, a symbolical name of an altar in the Desert
